originalText.text: Dr. Dexter Sun is an outstanding healthcare professional who offers personalized care and expert knowledge. From the moment I met him, I felt valued and at ease. Dr. Sun takes the time to listen, explain treatments clearly, and is committed to staying updated in his field. His attention to detail and skilled hands make every procedure comfortable. His support staff is efficient and friendly. I highly recommend Dr. Sun for his compassionate care and unwavering commitment to his patients' well-being. He has made a significant difference in my life, and I am truly grateful.

originalText.text: Dr. Dexter Sun is a healthcare gem. His expertise, personalized care, and warm demeanor make each visit exceptional. He listens, provides clear explanations, and stays up-to-date on the latest advances in his field. Dr. Sun's precision and gentle approach, along with his efficient support staff, create a seamless and reassuring experience. I highly recommend Dr. Sun for his commitment to patient well-being.

The most amazing , caring  &  patient

originalText.text:
I can't even rate the doctor himself because his office staff is such a nightmare to deal with that this place should be avoided at all costs.

Dr. Sun does not accept insurance and even if you have out-of-network benefits his office will never submit a claim on your behalf even when they say they will. I have confirmed with multiple insurance companies over numerous visits since last year that they never receive claims from this provider. The office doesn't read or respond to emails. If you need any sort of documents, medication refills, etc. you will be told on the phone that they will be sent over today or tomorrow but it will never, ever be done. I ended up having to file all my own claims and just to get the paperwork I needed I had to call nonstop and at times physically go to the office and demand it in person.

I recommend considering another provider because it is not worth the headache of dealing with this office.

originalText.text: I love Dr. Sun and his staff. I feel that I am getting the best level of care I could possibly have. I suffered from bad headaches for over 5 years. Dr. Sun taught me about migraine management and he is always super easy to talk to and open to questions/discussion regarding treatment and works with you for the best outcome. Highly recommend.
